entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 11
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS AROUND 30
